title: Ab Roller with Wifi
description:
This week, Felix, Emily and Anna are back in the studio to talk about Bill Dudley’s thoughts on Trump and the Fed, dig into the viability of Peloton and WeWork and to finally weigh in on Twitter’s great Chicken Sandwich Wars.
Plus: GE
Follow@felixsalmon, @Three_Guineas,@EmilyRPeck
